techmeme.title: Ring unveils a new $20 per month Ring Home Premium subscription, adding 24/7 recording and AI-powered Smart Video Search from November 5 in the US (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
KKR-owned BMC Software plans to split: BMC for enterprise mainframes and BMC Helix for enterprise software; BMC will get ~66% of BMC Software's $2.3B in revenue (Liana Baker/Bloomberg)
Glassdoor launches short videos, polls, and images to foster engagement on its platform, and says it has 63M monthly unique users, up from 55M in September 2021 (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
How Withheld for Privacy and other proxy services that help domain operators shield their identities have turned Iceland into a global hub for illicit activity (New York Times)
Microsoft issues Surface Duo 2's final security update ahead of its October 21 end of support; the Duo 2, released in October 2021, got one major Android update (Zac Bowden/Windows Central)
